#### Class 02/18/2020

```{r set-up, include=F}

library(tidycensus)

library(readxl)

library(tidyverse)

library(janitor)

x <- read_excel(
                  
                "class_enrollment_summary_by_term2.18.20.xlsx",
                
                skip = 3) %>% 
  
            clean_names() %>% 
            
            filter(! is.na(course_name))

```


```{r top 5 departments, include=F}

x1 <- x %>%
  
  group_by(course_department) %>%
  
  summarize(total = sum(u_grad)) %>%
  
  arrange(desc(total)) %>%
  
  slice(1:5) %>% pull(course_department)

```
